content:
Hi Grahame Grieve:
In the latest build there're error in log
'''
BUILD FAILED
/home/travis/build/hl7-fhir/fhir-svn/build.xml:30: The following error occurred while executing this line:
/home/travis/build/hl7-fhir/fhir-svn/tools/java/org.hl7.fhir.tools.core/build.xml:145: Java returned: 1
'''

I look into that file and the content of that line is ' maxmemory="8000m" >'

So I think it failed for not enough memory.
@Grahame Grieve TXT.rtf
